testcase.name: Register using valid data
testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed When Send an http "POST" request to "/api/register" with body:..............passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The response schema should be match with schema "register-schema.json"..passed And The Id is not null......................................................passed And The email should equal "testqa.wrc86@gmail.com".........................passed And The full_name should equal "Test QA"....................................passed And The department should equal "Technology"................................passed And The phone_number should equal "085611789000"............................passed

testcase.name: Login using valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed When Send an http "POST" request to "/api/login" with body:.................passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And Save the token from the response to the local storage...................passed

testcase.name: Create Object
testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed Given Have token on the local storage.......................................passed When Send an http "POST" request to "/api/objects" with body:...............passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The idObject is not null................................................passed And Save the idObject from the response to the local storage................passed And The name from the create response should be "Lenovo K14"................passed And The year from the create response should be 2024........................passed And The price from the create response should be 1849.99....................passed And The cpu_model from the create response should be "Intel Core i9"........passed And The hard_disk_size from the create response should be "1 TB"............passed And The capacity from the create response should be "2 cpu".................passed And The screen_size from the create response should be "14 inch"............passed And The color from the create response should be "black"....................passed

testcase.name: Get Single Object
testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed Given Have token on the local storage.......................................passed When Send an http "GET" request to "/{webhookId}/api/objects/{id}" with body:.passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The idObject is not null................................................passed And The name from the single-object response should be "Lenovo K14".........passed And The year from the single-object response should be "2024"...............passed And The price from the single-object response should be "1849.99"...........passed And The cpu_model from the single-object response should be "Intel Core i9".passed And The hard_disk_size from the single-object response should be "1 TB".....passed And The capacity from the single-object response should be 2................passed And The screen_size from the single-object response should be 14............passed And The color from the single-object response should be "black".............passed

testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed Given Have token on the local storage.......................................passed When Send an http "PUT" request to "/{webhookId}/api/objects/{id}" with body:.passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The idObject is not null................................................passed And The name from the update response should be "Lenovo Yoga"...............passed And The year from the update response should be 2025........................passed And The price from the update response should be 1999.99....................passed And The cpu_model from the update response should be "Intel Core i8"........passed And The hard_disk_size from the update response should be "2 TB"............passed And The capacity from the update response should be "4".....................passed And The screen_size from the update response should be "12".................passed And The color from the update response should be "gray".....................passed

testcase.name: Partially Update Object
testcase.system-out: Given The base url in this feature is "https://whitesmokehouse.com/webhook".passed Given Have token on the local storage.......................................passed When Send an http "PATCH" request to "/{webhookId}/api/object/{id}" with body:.passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The idObject is not null................................................passed And The name from the partially update response should be "Lenovo Ideapad"..passed And The year from the partially update response should be "2027"............passed And The color from the partially update response should be "white"..........passed
